summary: This is an email chain from January 9, 2020, between personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) discussing a request for a 'CP report' (likely Child Pornography or Child Protection report). The chain forwards an attachment titled 'Child_Exploitation--Charges_from_Date_III_for_Janis.pdf' and identifies Olsen Clancy as a Victim Witness Coordinator.

events.title: Request for Child Exploitation Report

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York dated January 9, 2020.
The subject involves a request for a 'CP report', with an attached file explicitly named 'Child_Exploitation--Charges_from_Date_III_for_Janis.pdf'.
Olsen Clancy is identified as a Victim Witness Coordinator at the office, indicating the context relates to victim services within a federal prosecution.
The email recipients' names (e.g., Janis, Drew) and the sender/cc fields are redacted with the placeholder '(USANYS)', indicating they are personnel within that office.
The document is part of the Epstein case files (EFTA00088951), linking this internal administrative communication to the broader investigation.
